content: minnesconsin cowl instructions cast on 120 place maker and join in the round work a k2 x p2 materials rib for a total of 8 rounds knit 3 rounds yarn 1 skein hazel knits lively dk the body of the cowl is worked by knitting every stitch you ll 275 yds/130g work the dandelion stitch every time the working yarn changes to colorway interstate park mn yarn shop the color burst section when the working yarn begins to change hop 2022 needles us6 - 24 circular color work 4 or 5 stitches and then work dandelion stitch see notions stitch marker tapestry needle directions below going forward you ll knit every stitch until you leather tag come to another color burst section or you resolve a dandelion stitch from the previous row see directions below when cowl size & gauge measures 8 from cast on edge knit 3 rounds work a k2 x p2 10 tall x 25 circumference rib for a total of 8 rounds bind off in pattern block attach tag 19 sts x 30 row = 4 on a us6 blocked with mn or wi showing and go visit a state park abbreviations dandelion stitch insert right needle 2 sts to the left and down 3 sts pull up a loop k=knit with your right needle *k2 insert needle through the same stitch p=purl to pull up another loop * repeat from * to * one more time k2tog=knit the next 2 stitches together sts=stitches resolve dandelion stitch when you get to the dandelion stitch from the previous row k2tog this is the stitch before the dandelion stitch together with the first stitch of the dandelion stitch k1 k2tog k1 k2tog notes if the color burst section lands on top of another dandelion stitch feel free to skip it our mn yarn shop hop 2022 colorway is inspired by the landscape paintings of local artist emily anderson fabulous color bursts of autumn inspired yellow orange and red stillwater mn darnknitanyway com ©2022 darn knit anyway all rights reserved you are allowed to make a copy of this pattern for personal use only in 651 342 1386 whole or part editing and using the pattern as the basis for another pattern or as a template publishing transmitting emailing this pattern to others or posting online in whole or part is strictly prohibited
